level.prolog: You slip out of bed. Your bare feet touch the cool carpet floor. The room is illuminated by the digital LCD clock on your nightstand, the light streaming in from the window, and the glowing-red santa night-light. Your bedroom door is slightly ajar, allowing you to see into the hall.

room.name: Bedroom
room.description: Your bedroom is cool, but not completely dark. A santa clause night light lays in the corner under a desk. A glowing green LCD clock sits on your nightstand. The bedroom door leads out to the hallway, and is opposite the window.

simple_object.name: Desk
simple_object.description: A simple wooden desk. It is full of junk

actions.action: You don't have time to sit at your desk

simple_object.name: Nightlight
simple_object.description: Mommy gave you the santa night-light. It glows red and is glows from underneath the desk

simple_object.name: Window
simple_object.description: The window looks out into the dark street The street is dusted with a fresh layer of white snow

simple_object.name: Clock
simple_object.description: The clock glows green with the time 11:50 PM

simple_object.name: Nightstand
simple_object.description: The wooden nightstand sits next to your bed. On top is a LCD clock

simple_object.name: Bed
simple_object.description: Your twin size rocket themed bed sits in the corner. The sheets are disturbed from climbing out The warmness tempts you, but you have been waiting all year for this night

simple_object.name: Poster
simple_object.description: A poster of space hangs above the desk

actions.action: You look at the poster. It is a space poster with some sort of nebula on it
You have a feeling you will tear it if you take it down

exit.name: Bedroom Door
exit.description: The simple white door stands ajar, and leads out to the hallway

actions.action: You tiptoe across the room to the door, and enter the hallway

room.name: Hallway
room.description: The second floor hallway leads to three doors: your parents' bedroom, your bedroom, and the bathroom A stairwell descends to the main level. You have to be very quiet

exit.name: stairs
exit.description: The carpeted stairs reach a small landing, turn 90 degrees, and then exit on the main level

exit.name: Bedroom Door
exit.description: A simple white door with a silver knob

exit.name: Bathroom Door
exit.description: Another white door, this one leads to the upstairs bathroom

actions.action: You do not have to use the bathroom right now.

exit.name: stairs
exit.description: The stairs lead back up to the second floor hallway
